name: Game Boy Advance Video: Sonic X: Volume 1
description: Two of your favorite episodes from the Sonic the Hedgehog animated series arrive on the Game Boy Advance. Sonic X: Volume 1 includes 'Chaos Control Freaks' and 'Sonic to the Rescue.' In 'Chaos Control Freaks,' Dr. Eggman blasts Sonic into a world where Sonic is the target of a high-speed police squad. In 'Sonic to the Rescue,' Sonic and Chuck attempt to rescue Cream and Cheese from a top secret military base filled with booby traps.
